===Etymology===
From the 5 sheep or goats supposedly ridden by the Taoist immortals who visited Guangzhou at its founding and introduced the cultivation of rice to its people. Their mounts were said to have turned into the five stones once preserved in the city's [[w:Five Immortals Grotto|Temple of the Five Immortals]].
